options.fig-cap: Illustration of constructing a null distribution.  Notice the similarity to constructing the sampling distributon.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-41

options.fig-cap: Null distribution for the proportion of volunteers assigned to clean wildlife experiencing adverse respiratory symptoms.  The null hypothesis is that the proportion is 0.20; this model is based on a sample size of 54.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-42

options.fig-cap: Likelihood of obtaining a statistic as extreme or moreso as that of the original sample when the parameter of interest is the proportion of volunteers assigned to clean wildlife experiencing adverse respiratory symptoms.  The null hypothesis is that the proportion is 0.20; this is based on a sample of size 54.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-43
